info.name: RBAC Commerce API
info.description: Complete RBAC Commerce API organised by Admin, Client, and Public modules.

item.name: Admin
item.description: Configuration, catalog, marketing, and operational APIs used by dashboard administrators.

item.name: User Management APIs
item.description:
CRUD, status controls, role assignment, and profile updates for internal and customer accounts.

Base path: /api/v1

request.description:
Returns a paginated list of users filtered by optional search, sort, and paging parameters.

Auth: Bearer token required

originalRequest.description:
Returns a paginated list of users filtered by optional search, sort, and paging parameters.

Auth: Bearer token required

Returns a paginated list of users filtered by optional search, sort, and paging parameters.

request.description:

Auth: Bearer token required

originalRequest.description:

Auth: Bearer token required

request.description:
Creates a new user and dispatches an activation email if enabled.

Auth: Bearer token required

request.description:

item.name: Product Review APIs
item.description:
Moderate customer reviews, toggle visibility, and inject staff replies.

Base path: /api/v1/product-reviews

request.description:
Paginated filterable review directory with rating, product, and customer filters.

Auth: Bearer token required

response.name: List reviews - Success

originalRequest.description:
Paginated filterable review directory with rating, product, and customer filters.

Auth: Bearer token required

request.description:
Loads full review details including moderation metadata and attachments.

Auth: Bearer token required

response.name: Get review - Success

originalRequest.description:
Loads full review details including moderation metadata and attachments.

Auth: Bearer token required

response.body:
{
  "id": 511,
  "rating": 5,
  "title": "Stunning glow",
  "comment": "Looks incredible on the desk.",
  "visible": true
}

originalRequest.description:
Loads full review details including moderation metadata and attachments.

Auth: Bearer token required

request.description:
Allows staff to seed a curated review on behalf of a user.

Auth: Bearer token required

body.raw:
{
  "productId": 101,
  "customerId": 44,
  "rating": 5,
  "title": "Stunning glow",
  "comment": "Looks incredible on the desk.",
  "visible": true
}

originalRequest.description:
Allows staff to seed a curated review on behalf of a user.

Auth: Bearer token required

{

request.description:

Auth: Bearer token required

Auth: Bearer token required
